response.overview: Report by INTER TV, featuring testimonials from four individuals (three Latin Americans and one North American) and their relationship with the French capital. Participants in the report include George Whitman, owner of the popular and legendary Parisian bookshop ‘Shakespeare and Company’; Chilean poet, journalist and musician Osvaldo ‘Gitano’ Rodríguez; Argentine filmmaker Hugo Santiago; and Peruvian writer Manuel Scorza.
response.title: En Paris...
